channel.title: Creoso - Golly Gee!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/vXVBLGy.jpg[/img][/center] [center][size=10pt][url=http://www.creosops.com/][img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]Forums[/url][/size][/center] [hr] [center][b][size=14pt]About Us:[/size][/b][/center] Creoso is a standard 317 server. None of the fancy loading 933+ bullshit. We're attempting for an old-school like gameplay for anyone interested in that style of gaming. I know a lot of you like that kind of thing, so I'm deciding to make it. I'm going to be releasing the source once it's done, and you all can download it to your will. If you'd like to, that is. I hope you all enjoy and follow the project, keep actively posting, and supporting Creoso! Some good news, before I release this to you all, I'm going to be hosting it for you guys. I'll be hosting it, maintaining it, updating it, and controlling it. I'm not going to be going into the race for a large community, I'm just hosting this for the MoparScape community. Well, that's just what I'm doing at first. For a good few months. Then I'll let the community decide whether or not to join in the race. If so, I'll develop a voting system where you can all get rewards. This server is going to be economy based. That means low experience rates, hard to get items, all that good stuff. We're going to try and maintain a good economy, giving you guys a challenge. So, that being, you'll have to put some time in to get the items you desire to get. We're working very hard to maintain this economy, and if beta testers find a flaw, they will tell us right away. [hr] [hr] [center][b][size=14pt]Beta Info:[/size][/b][/center] I will be hosting this for beta testing purposes. I might just keep it open as a MoparScape community server-only type of thing. I won't have us on any toplists, I won't be taking any donations, and I won't be buying any advertisements. This server will basically be just for whomever knows about it, and wants to play it. Hopefully some of you MoparScapers out there will want to play this with me. I will be needed beta testers in the future, before I open it up to everyone. I'll be taking in ten beta testers as soon as I get the project going. You guys should apply right now, in fact! I'll start up the list in the pre-alpha stage, then will be allowing them to have access to the server once the beta is officially released. All the beta tester spots are now filled. We will no longer be taking any applications. [hr] [hr] [center][b][size=14pt]Updates:[/size][/b][/center]
-Removed Turmoil -Removed SoulSplit -Fixed general store. You are able to buy & sell from it without being able to dupe -Instant switching -Lag reduced -Instant walking -Prevent action if user walks away -Fixed firemaking experience gaining -Fixed max hits on switching -Use X bones on altar -Patched rollback item dupes -Lag reduced further -Extremely enhanced yelling system -Enhanced the combat system a lot -Perfect woodcutting system -63 waves of Jad -Door handler (kind of buggy) -Double experience weekends -Flax picking -Idle logout timer -Perfect mining -Perfected the flax picking -Shutdown hook implemented (no rollbacks!) -Combat enhanced -Bank deposit box added -Rewrote the drop system -Process cleaned -Drop system rewritten -Dialogue system revamped -Improved thieving -Sell X amount to shops -Better cycle events -Replaced all events -Removed NPC walking -Removed drops [for another rewrite] -Realistic teleports added -Source changed -Implemented most things from other source -Task scheduler implemented -Crafting updated -Fletching updated -Agility revamped (thanks to L&P)
[hr] [hr] [center][b][size=14pt]The Team:[/size][/b][/center] [b]Beta Testers:[/b] [ol][li]Jmood[/li] [li]Flame_[/li] [li]Revitalize[/li] [li]Vain_[/li] [li]Fails[/li] [li]Avarrocka[/li] [li]Host Gushers[/li] [li]LindseyCrystal[/li] [li]Cherylcole[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ol] [b]Developers:[/b] [ul][li][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=496183]Uncalled[/url][/li][/ul] [hr] [hr] [b][size=14pt]Media:[/size][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lWKHfAs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UC36yWr.gif[/img] [img]http://www.nova-tier.com/XBones.gif[/img] [img]http://www.nova-tier.com/Woodcutting.gif[/img] [img]http://www.nova-tier.com/Flax.gif[/img] [img]http://www.nova-tier.com/Mining.gif[/img] [img]http://www.nova-tier.com/Flax2.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UMXN1Xc.png[/img] [img]http://nova-tier.com/Thieving.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zjinINO.png[/img] [img]http://www.nova-tier.com/SellX.gif[/img]

item.title: Creoso - Golly Gee!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:163, topic:520848”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=639358.msg4337384#msg4337384 date=1374602090]

[quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=639358.msg4337316#msg4337316 date=1374589968]
I never liked the idea of “starting off in a rich person’s courtyard”

It would be more realistic “growing up” as a peasant. Does that make sense?
[/quote]I’m not sure what you’re talking about, but that little statement you made there did happen to spark up an idea to start off in the server.
[/quote]think about it

in lumbridge there is a castle, where the KING resides. He has servants and all that.

In lumbridge you also have a bunch of either 1) decent houses near shops ( so in the city ) and then you have some semi run down houses.[/quote]Yes, that’s a similar idea of what I came up with. I decided that the home will not be in front of the Lumbridge castle, but instead somewhere in a house or something of the sort. This will also come with an introduction to the server.
[hr]
[hr]
Updates:
Teleport system added

EDIT:
[hr]
[hr]
Updates:
I have switched to a more efficient base. I figured that this would be a perfect base for the Creoso project. It’s a source that I had worked on a little bit on a project a while back. It’s got some good skilling, it’s pretty efficient already. I’ll just implement a couple things, like the dialogue system Arham added (all credits to him for it), the door system, I may make a ladder system. I’m not too sure yet. This source already has clipping in it, player & NPC. I’m just working on adding thousands of spawns at the moment, but that’s all for now. Everything is moving along pretty smoothly! Can’t wait to post more pictures for you guys.

EDIT:
[hr]
[hr]
Updates:
I’ve implemented most things from the other source. I’ve still got some things to add in, like the flax picking and such. I’ll make it to where you’ll be able to make strings for fletching and such. Which leads me to my next updates - crafting and fletching have been updated quite a bit. They’re now more realistic, and I’ll have to do that with a lot of the other skills. I’ll provide some pictures for you guys soon enough. Also, thanks to L&P, we’ve got a great agility system. I haven’t gotten the time to test it, but it should work perfectly. It’s got the gnome course, wilderness course, barbarian course, & werewolf courses all in it. I can’t wait to go and test it out and upload some more pictures for you guys.

EDIT:
New poll for home! Those two were tied up, so now the voting now resets.

Read full topic

item.title: Creoso - Golly Gee!
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:158, topic:520848”]News:
[hr]
I have tampered with some things, and I have removed the NPC walking system entirely - as I am going to redo it. I have also removed the dropping system, as I will also redo that yet again. I’ve changed homes to Lumbridge, and have started working on spawns there. Be warned: if this starts to look like a '06 remake, do not fall for it. I have never attempted an '06 remake and I never will. This is just an economy based private server, nothing else.

I do have a question to ask you guys, is there a specific location in Lumbridge you want the home to be, or just keep it as RuneScape’s?[/quote]I never liked the idea of “starting off in a rich person’s courtyard”

It would be more realistic “growing up” as a peasant. Does that make sense?

Read full topic

item.title: Creoso - Golly Gee!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

News:
[hr]
I have tampered with some things, and I have removed the NPC walking system entirely - as I am going to redo it. I have also removed the dropping system, as I will also redo that yet again. I’ve changed homes to Lumbridge, and have started working on spawns there. Be warned: if this starts to look like a '06 remake, do not fall for it. I have never attempted an '06 remake and I never will. This is just an economy based private server, nothing else.

I do have a question to ask you guys, is there a specific location in Lumbridge you want the home to be, or just keep it as RuneScape’s?

Read full topic

item.title: Creoso - Golly Gee!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

What is your age?:

24

Why do you want to become a beta tester?:

I believe you have seen my betaing qualifications before and thus I believe I would be a good fit. As to WHY…I have completed what testing I am doing for Microzoft and Skyro backed out of the RS partnership.

What are your goals with us?:

Do I honestly need any? I am testing…

Will you follow, respect, and maintain any rules set for the beta testing?:

Sure

Do you have any recommendations?:

Yeah don’t have us waste time filling out an application which could had been done in three questions

What will be your in-game alias?:

Loveandpower/Cruel Truth/Harry Potter one of those most likely.

What will be your forum alias?:

^ same as above but I believed I registered as loveandpower

Will you respect the community in a fashionable manner?:

Sure

Read full topic
